title: Questor: even at 30 times earnings Rightmove is a buy for its market dominance
text:
Questor share tip: its estate agent customers can’t do without it and it is continuing to innovate in order to boost profitability

Searching for your next home increasingly takes place in front of a computer rather than in front of an estate agent’s window.

Rightmove’s comprehensive listings provide simplicity and convenience for home hunters. It could be your first, or even only, port of call when you look for your next home.

The company’s dominance of the online property listings market is exceptional. Despite the best efforts of rivals such as Zoopla and OnTheMarket, Rightmove had 76pc of desktop and mobile traffic in 2018. In an industry that is becoming increasingly digital, this could...
